title: PersonNameType
description: A component for capturing summary or fine-grain data comprising a person's name.

formattedName.description: The formatted name of a person, as it would be written out together (for example, on a mailing label).

legal.description: The legal name of a person (typically used if it differs from family name).

given.description: The given name of a person.

preferred.description: The preferred name of a person (if it differs from given name).

middle.description: The middle names or initials of a person.

family.description: The family name (or surname) of a person.

familyPrefix.description: The prefix of a family name, e.g. van der, de jong.

alias.description: An alias or (or also known as) name of a person.

formerFamily.description: The former family name of a person (used if the person's name was changed).

formerFamilyPrefix.description: The prefix of the former family name, e.g. van der, de jong.

preferredSalutationCode.description: The salutation used to address a person (such as Dr., Mr., Mrs.).

generationAffixCode.description: The generational designation attached to the end of a person's name (such as Jr., Sr., II, III).

qualificationAffixCode.description: The professional designation attached to the end of a person's name (such as M.Sc., Ph.D).

titleAffixCode.description: The title designation attached to the end of a person's name (such as Esq., K.B.E.).

script.description: Script used to represent the name.
